short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Go when the light's green, stop when the light's red

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple game where your goal is to roll the cube to the finish line! You can't move when it says "Red Light", but you can go when it says "Green light".
